info.title: Bpmn Service
info.description: a Reusable, customizable and workflow based task service.

externalIdentifier.description: The key that is used to identify the workflow in the respective workflow engine.

provider.description: Provider could be the engine that will handle the workflow - camunda, zeebe, etc

inputSchema.description: Schema used for validation during workflow execution

key.description: An identifier for a particular event queued by a service or a user

description.description: A short description of an event

source.description: Origination of an event- can be a service or from a user

payload.description: A dynamic object that contains information to be run in the workers of a bpmn engine

timestamp.description: A short message to indicate the progression of the event

eventKey.description: An identifier for a particular event queued by a service or a user

workflowKey.description: An identifier for a particular workflow

key.description: An identifier for a particular task within an event

name.description: A name given by the consumer service for this task

description.description: A short description of this task

status.description: A short message to indicate the progression of the task

workflowKey.description: An identifier for a particular workflow

taskKey.description: An identifier for a particular task within an event

key.description: An identifier for a particular task within an event

name.description: A name given by the consumer service for this task

description.description: A short description of this task

status.description: A short message to indicate the progression of the task

key.description: An identifier for a particular task within an event

name.description: A name given by the consumer service for this task

description.description: A short description of this task

status.description: A short message to indicate the progression of the task
